metrics.name: Hook (Entry Pull)
metrics.description: Initial attraction without gimmick; the first 15 seconds of looking.
prompts: Where did your eye land first and why?
Name the specific device (edge, value jump, scale shock).
metrics.evidence: Try scoring an artwork you're looking at right now. What grabbed your attention first?
metrics.notes: Use this tool to evaluate any artwork—your own or others'.

scale.5: Magnetic and specific; device is nameable.

metrics.name: Stickiness (Time-on-Look)
metrics.description: How long attention sustains without boredom.
prompts: How long before you want to step away?
metrics.evidence: Does the work hold your attention for minutes, not seconds?

metrics.name: Deepening (New Finds/min)
metrics.description: Discovery rate over minutes 1–7; compounding relations.
prompts: List three new relations you noticed between minutes 3–6.
metrics.evidence: Do you keep finding new things the longer you look?

metrics.name: Guidance (Compositional Intent)
metrics.description: Steering of the eye via edges/intervals/repeats; diagrammable paths.
prompts: Sketch the route your eye takes (focal → counterform → rest).
metrics.evidence: Does the composition guide your eye deliberately?

metrics.name: Coherence (Edge-to-Edge Integrity)
metrics.description: Every inch earns its keep; no dead paint holes.
prompts: Point to the laziest square inch; why?
metrics.evidence: Is every part of the work alive and intentional?

scale.3: Mostly live with a soft quadrant

metrics.name: Material Necessity
metrics.description: Do ground/scale/reflectance feel required for the effect?
prompts: Name the parameter that would break the effect if changed.
metrics.evidence: Would changing the material fundamentally change the work?

metrics.name: Embodiment (Viewer Movement)
metrics.description: Does the work train your body—close/far, left/right—because readings unlock?
prompts: What did moving your body change in the reading?
metrics.evidence: Do you need to move around to fully experience it?

metrics.name: Afterimage / Afterthought
metrics.description: Persistence of optical/tactile memory after looking away.
prompts: Describe what returns unbidden an hour later.
metrics.evidence: Does the work stick with you after you leave?

metrics.name: Return Impulse (Next-Day)
prompts: What unresolved question pulls you back?
metrics.evidence: Do you want to see it again tomorrow?

scale.5: Reroute your path to see it again

metrics.name: Intersubjective Traction
metrics.description: Independent viewers converge on seen features.
prompts: Overlap between three viewers' seen facts (A∩B)/ (A∪B).
metrics.evidence: Do different people notice the same things?
